segments.text: I ’ ll show you around and explain the operation as we go along .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is our office block . We have all the administrative depart - ments there . Down there is the research and development section .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do you spend on development every year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s that building opposite us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s the warehouse . We keep a stock of the faster moving items so that urgent orders can be met quickly from stock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I placed an order now , how long would it be before I got delivery ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It would largely depend on the size of the order and the items you want .
segments.speaker: S1
